isis.stitle: BE 200 BUS FRONT END AND BODY COMPONENTS - Windshield wiper Drive System

svcsubproc.title: Windshield Wiper Motor- Remove
svcsubproc.para: This section covers the servicing, removal and installation of the windshield wiper system. The windshield wiper system is a single motor dual drive wiper system. The windshield wiper motor is located under the defroster duct, and mounted to the cross bus beam assembly. To remove the wiper motor assembly, the windshield wipers must be removed from the drive arms. See windshield wiper section in this manual.

step1.para: Locate the windshield wiper arm assembly to be removed and swing the wiper arm out at the swivel assembly.
Disconnect the windshield wiper fluid supply line from the connector at the wiper arm base.
Remove the plastic cap assembly covering the wiper arm attachment nut.
Loosen and remove the attachment nut.
Make a mark on the wiper arm assembly with a coinciding mark on the wiper drive stud. This will help in the re-alignment when re-installing the wiper arm on the drive.
Locate the bushing and jam nut behind wiper arm mounting, loosen and remove.
Follow the same procedure to remove the opposite side wiper drive arm.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. DRIVER SIDE WINDSHIELD WIPER DRIVE ARM
3. PASSENGER SIDE WINDSHIELD WIPER DRIVE ARM
4. WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR ASSEMBLY MOUNTING BOLTS

step1.para: Proceed to interior of bus body and follow dash board panel removal procedures. Reference Dash Board Panels, Cluster and Switch Panel removal.
If the bus is equipped with a step well heater, remove the face plate, disconnect the defroster hose connection clamp to allow clearance for duct repositioning.

When the dash panels covers and step well heater face plate (if equipped) are removed reposition the passenger end of defroster duct. Lift duct upward and support to get access to wiper motor and mounting assembly.
Locate the wiper motor harness plug assembly and disconnect from cab harness section.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. DRIVER SIDE WINDSHIELD WIPER DRIVE ARM
4. PASSENGER SIDE WINDSHIELD WIPER DRIVE ARM

step1.para: Locate the windshield drive arm lock nut and washer on the drive stud on the front side of the wiper motor.
Loosen and remove the nut and washers, slide the drive arms off the stud.
Locate the mounting nut on the wiper motor drive stud securing the wiper drive arms to the wiper motor assembly.
Loosen and remove the drive arm mounting nuts, and washers.
Locate the three wiper motor mounting bolts, nuts and washers securing the motor to the mounting plate.
Loosen and remove the bolts, nuts and washers.
Follow the reverse procedure to install the wiper motor, drive arms and wipers.
